Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In ataxia - telangiectasia ( A - T ) patients , mutations in a single gene , ATM , result in an autosomal recessive syndrome that embraces a variety of clinical features and manifests extreme radiosensitivity and a strong pre - disposition to malignancy .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Ataxia-telangiectasia (A-T) |
| Autosomal recessive syndrome |
| Extreme radiosensitivity |
| Predisposition to malignancy |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Ataxia-telangiectasia (A-T) |
| Autosomal recessive syndrome |
| Extreme radiosensitivity |
| Predisposition to malignancy |

Explanation:

* Ataxia-telangiectasia (A-T) is a disease.
* Autosomal recessive syndrome is a type of disease inheritance pattern.
* Extreme radiosensitivity and predisposition to malignancy are clinical features of Ataxia-telangiectasia (A-T) and therefore can be considered as part of the disease.
